diff_act: 1.allow changes to users' accounts remotely through an additional login password.
2.Display all affected devices or workstations within the RLCS network to the operator for verification before applying changes when an operator is making changes on the system.
3.Provide an additional login password requirement to enhance system security when configuring device rules.
4.Provide an additional login password option for configuring device rules securely.
5.provide an option for users to log in with an additional password to ensure secure access while modifying device rules

regen.absent_element: requirement of using additional login password when configuring device rules
regen.new_specification: The system shall require an additional login password when configuring device rules to enhance security.

regen.absent_element: additional login password requirement for device rule configuration
regen.new_specification: The system shall require an additional login password when configuring device rules to ensure enhanced security.

regen.absent_element: requirement of an additional login password
regen.new_specification: The system shall require an additional login password to change user accounts and configure device rules remotely to ensure security.

label: The option to configure device rules shall require an additional login password for that option.
absence: an additional login password for configuring device rules
